spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall massing roughly matches (garage on right, main living to the right/center, kitchen central), but multiple plan-defined spaces are not clearly represented or are relocated. Alfresco placement/extent does not match the large top-right outdoor zone in the 2D plan. Several internal partitions (recesses, linen/WIR/WC separations) appear simplified/merged, affecting room boundaries and circulation.

structural_fidelity.notes: Key adjacency relationships are partially correct (kitchen adjacent to living; garage adjacent to living zone), but several required rooms/areas are missing or not legibly separated (Bed 2, Study, Verandah/Portico/Entry definition, multiple WCs/WIRs). Door and window specification from the plan is not faithfully embedded—many openings are absent or not placed per plan. Exterior articulation is heavily simplified compared with the 2D layout.

furniture_mapping.notes: Living and dining furniture broadly aligns with an open-plan living/dining concept, and bedrooms have beds placed. However, furniture does not reliably map to named rooms (e.g., theatre seating vs. living, activity space definition), and scaling/fit-to-room is approximate due to missing/merged room partitions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric viewpoint is acceptable, but the render is low clarity/blurred, reducing verifiability of doors/windows and fine partitions. Lighting is serviceable. Geometry appears mostly clean but simplified; the lack of visible windows/door details harms visual fidelity to architectural intent.

detected_errors.description: Missing Bed 2: the 2D plan shows a distinct Bed 2 left-middle; the 3D render does not clearly include a separate fourth bedroom beyond the two top bedrooms and the master.
Missing/unclear Study near Entry (bottom-center in plan): the 3D render does not show a clearly partitioned study in the specified location.
Missing exterior areas: Verandah and Portico (bottom edge in plan) are not represented as defined outdoor/covered zones in the 3D render.

Alfresco is misplaced and/or undersized: plan shows a large alfresco at top-right adjacent to both Living and Activity; the 3D shows a much smaller terrace-like area that does not match the plan’s footprint/connection.
Activity room definition is weakened/relocated: the plan has a distinct Activity space central-top; in the 3D it appears merged into circulation/open area without the same boundaries.
Missing/unclear Pantry: the plan shows a distinct pantry off the kitchen; the 3D does not clearly model it as a separate enclosed space.
Missing/unclear WIR + WC cluster near Entry (plan shows WC recess and WIR adjacent to entry zone): these spaces are not clearly separated/present in the 3D render.

Door placement/orientation not verifiable and likely incorrect: multiple hinged doors shown in plan (bedrooms, WCs, entry, theatre, garage internal access) are missing or not modeled with correct swing/orientation.
Window placement largely missing: the 2D plan implies numerous perimeter windows; the 3D render shows mostly blank exterior walls with little/no window modeling.
Proportion distortion of outdoor/edge spaces: the plan’s strong top-right alfresco and bottom verandah/portico proportions are not preserved in the 3D massing.
Hallucinated/ambiguous room at top-right: the small furnished nook/space appears as an internalized room/terrace not matching the plan’s large alfresco configuration and boundaries.
Rendering artifact/low resolution blur reduces legibility of partitions, doors, and window openings, impacting verification.
